name: Kanak'sKitchen
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kanak's kitchen
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Kanaks Kitchen Recipes is an Alexa skill, where you will find step by step voice instructions to prepare an awesome dish from a selection of over thousands of simple recipes across Indian and international cuisines. No more rewinding videos or turning pages with greasy hands. All you have to do is ask.
 Just say, "Alexa, enable Kanaks Kitchen" on your device, and ask for a recipe you like.
 With voice guided cooking that is interactive and intelligent, Kanaks Kitchen Recipes comes with helpful Chef Tips to make your cooking easier, more fun and definitely delicious. Kanaks Kitchen Recipes is powered by tinychef.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
